body:
I know that these threats are pointless and I think these are spam but I'd like to inform you that I'm leaving for mostly the reason of higher education. I will still play minecraft but on my friends private, hardcore, survival server. 
If you want to join us search HMCP Enjin. (No links, as for advertisement). Would be fun to maybe see some of the pros do the survival of the game. 

Thank you you to all my friends I will pop in out sometimes but not as often. 

Regards
Kamil
